original_text: He followed the ways of his father Asa and did not stray from them; he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 길로 행하여 돌이켜 떠나지 아니하고 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: He followed the ways of his father Asa
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버자 아사의 길을 따랐고

sentences.original_text: and did not stray from them
in the eyes of the Lord
